import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={theme:'dark',// dark | light
sideBarCollapsed:false};var slice=createSlice({name:'appState',initialState:initialState,reducers:{selectTheme:function selectTheme(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;state.theme=payload;},toggleTheme:function toggleTheme(state){if(state.theme==='light'){state.theme='dark';}else{state.theme='light';}},toggleSideBarCollapsed:function toggleSideBarCollapsed(state){state.sideBarCollapsed=!state.sideBarCollapsed;},setSideBarCollapsed:function setSideBarCollapsed(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;state.sideBarCollapsed=payload;}}});export var appStateActions=slice.actions;export var appStateSelector=function appStateSelector(state){return state.appState;};export default slice.reducer;
